short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Checks the selected IP address or domain name's Sender Score via Return Path

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Select an IP address or domain name on a webpage, then right-click to find out what is the email sender's reputation via http://www.senderscore.org

IMPORTANT NOTE: This extension is developed independently of Return Path Inc
